data.persona: I love to be on the lookout.  I intend to keep everyone safe.  I work hard each time.
data.description:
You are in the The tower base.
The tower base has a path of cobblestone leading to the entrance. Two torches are lit with large blazing fires. Most of the tower base is covered in moss.
There's a tower, a torch, a path, and a moss here.
The villager is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to look out for shady individuals and ensure they're following the law
data.mid_motivation: I want to arrest and detain any unlawful individuals in the village
data.long_motivation: I want to keep the town free of lawlessness and keep order.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: eat Food to prepare for a day of work

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the base of the tower to start patrol

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go location of shady villager I spotted

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put my hands in villager's shoulders

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go to jailhouse with unconscious villager
